## Problem 1

Classify the following variables as qualitative (binary, nominal, or ordinal) or quantitative (discrete or continous).

1. Homework feedback, labeled as “poor”, “fair”, “good”, “very good”
  Qualitative - ordinal
2. Homework feedback, labeled as "fail", "pass"
  Qualitative - binary
3. Country of birth
  Qualitative - nominal
4. The quantity of grapes (in lbs) to make 3 liters of wine
  Quantitative - continuous
5. Number of TAs in the P8130 course
  Quantitative - discrete
